Chinese.welcome: 加入本战局，在本战局游玩请遵守规则，祝你玩得开心，use command /language English Change to english
Chinese.rules: 规则：请不要发广告，这将会自动踢出

teleport.sent_succeed: 传送请求已发送，正在等待接受
teleport.accept_error: 没有人对您发出传送请求

English.welcome: Join the game,please follow the rules when playing in this game,glhf,使用/language Chinese切换中文

teleport.sent_succeed: A teleport request has been sent and is waiting to be accepted
teleport.request: %s requests to be teleported to your side
teleport.accept_error: No one has made a teleport request to you
